database.name: awslabbigdataagentstack_tripdata_db
database.purpose: Stores New York City taxi trip data for analysis and reporting

tables.name: nyc_taxi_trip
tables.purpose: Contains detailed information about taxi trips in New York City, including pickup and dropoff times, locations, fare details, and payment information

partitioning.name: taxi_class
partitioning.purpose: Distinguishes between different types of taxis (yellow and green)

columns.name: vendorid
columns.purpose: Identifier for the vendor providing the trip data

columns.name: lpep_pickup_datetime
columns.purpose: Date and time when the passenger was picked up (used for green taxis)

columns.name: lpep_dropoff_datetime
columns.purpose: Date and time when the passenger was dropped off (used for green taxis)

columns.name: store_and_fwd_flag
columns.purpose: Flag indicating whether the trip record was stored in vehicle memory before sending to the vendor ('Y' for yes, 'N' for no)

columns.name: ratecodeid
columns.purpose: The rate code in effect at the end of the trip (1=Standard rate, 2=JFK, 3=Newark, 4=Nassau or Westchester, 5=Negotiated fare, 6=Group ride)

columns.name: pulocationid
columns.purpose: TLC Taxi Zone where the passenger was picked up

columns.name: dolocationid
columns.purpose: TLC Taxi Zone where the passenger was dropped off

columns.name: passenger_count
columns.purpose: Number of passengers in the vehicle

columns.name: trip_distance
columns.purpose: Distance of the trip in miles

columns.name: fare_amount
columns.purpose: Base fare amount in dollars

columns.name: extra
columns.purpose: Extra charges (night surcharge, etc.) in dollars

columns.name: mta_tax
columns.purpose: Metropolitan Transportation Authority tax amount

columns.name: tip_amount
columns.purpose: Tip amount paid by the passenger

columns.name: tolls_amount
columns.purpose: Total amount of tolls paid during the trip

columns.name: ehail_fee
columns.purpose: E-hail fee for electronically hailed trips

columns.name: improvement_surcharge
columns.purpose: Improvement surcharge assessed on trips

columns.name: total_amount
columns.purpose: Total amount charged to the passenger (excluding cash tips)

columns.name: payment_type
columns.purpose: Method of payment (1=Credit card, 2=Cash, 3=No charge, 4=Dispute, 5=Unknown)

columns.name: trip_type
columns.purpose: Trip type indicator (1=Street hail, 2=Dispatch)

columns.name: congestion_surcharge
columns.purpose: Congestion surcharge for trips in congested areas

columns.name: cbd_congestion_fee
columns.purpose: Central Business District congestion fee

columns.name: tpep_pickup_datetime
columns.purpose: Date and time when the passenger was picked up (used for yellow taxis)

columns.name: tpep_dropoff_datetime
columns.purpose: Date and time when the passenger was dropped off (used for yellow taxis)

columns.name: airport_fee
columns.purpose: Fee charged for airport pickups or dropoffs
